  * [Leadership](https://meglmagic.com/leadership/)
  * [Committee Composition](https://meglmagic.com/committee-composition/)



Mr. Wai Ho Chan

Chairman of the Board

=Committees=

Mr. Wai Ho Chan, is a co-founder of our Group. Mr. Chan has more than 18 years of experience in investment banking and accounting industry. Prior to the establishment of our Group, Mr. Chan had worked in the corporate finance division of CCB International Capital Limited for about nine years from 2008 to 2016, with his last position as director of corporate finance. Prior to joining CCB International Capital Limited, Mr. Chan had worked as an auditor at international audit firms from 2003 to 2007. Mr. Chan is a CFA, a member of the HKICPA, and a fellow member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants. Mr. Chan graduated from the Faculty of Business Administration of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, with major in Professional Accountancy in 2003.

Mr. Sze Hon Johnson Chen

Chief Executive Officer

=Committees=

Mr. Sze Hon Johnson Chen, is a co-founder of our Group. Mr. Chen has more than 17 years of experience in investment banking and auditing services. Prior to the establishment of our Group, Mr. Chen had worked in the corporate finance division of Guotai Junan Capital Limited for more than 8 years from 2008 to 2016. Prior to joining Guotai Junan Capital Limited, Mr. Chen had worked as an auditor in KPMG from 2004 to 2007. Mr. Chen is a CFA, Certified Financial Risk Manager, a member of the HKICPA and AICPA and a fellow member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants. Mr. Chen graduated from the Faculty of Business Administration of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, with major in Professional Accountancy and minors in Economics and French Studies in 2004.

Ms. Yau Ting Tai 

Chief Financial Officer

=Committees=

Ms. Yau Ting Tai, joined the Group in 2016 since the establishment of the Group. Ms. Tai has over 17 years of experience in accounting, internal control, financial control, SEC reporting and capital markets. Prior to joining our Group, from 2008 to 2015, Ms. Tai served as the chief financial officer at Exceed Company Limited (a company listed on the Nasdaq) where she was mainly responsible for the accounting, financial management, internal control and investor relation. From 2004 to 2008, Ms. Tai worked as an auditor at Ernst & Young. Ms. Tai has been a member of the AICPA since 2007 and a member of CPA Australia since 2009. Ms. Tai graduated from the University of Toronto with a Bachelor’s degree in Applied Science in 2002 and a Master’s degree in Applied Science in 2004.

Mr. Yiu Sing Chan

Independent Director

=Committees=

Mr. Yiu Sing Chan, has over 15 years of experience in audit, investment, accounting and finance. He joined an international audit firm in 2006 and was an audit manager of such audit firm until 2012 prior to joining Best Pacific International Holdings Limited as chief financial officer since2013. Best Pacific International Holdings Limited was listed on the Stock Exchange (stock code: 2111) in 2014, and Mr. Chan was appointed as chief financial officer and company secretary since 2014 and as executive director since 2021. Mr. Chan graduated from the University of New South Wales in Australia with a master’s degree in commerce 2005 and a bachelor’s degree in accounting and finance in 2003. He has been a member of the HKICPA since 2009.

Mr. Chi Wai Siu 

Independent Director

=Committees=

Mr. Chi Wai Siu, has over 15 years of experience in investment banking, transaction advisory and valuation fields. From 2015 to 2008, Mr. Siu began his career as a financial analyst with Canada’s Ministry of Finance. Between 2008 and 2010, Mr. Siu worked as a Senior Analyst in GCAProfessional Services Group, a financial advisory firm providing valuation, advisory, mining and mineral consultancy as well as corporate services. From 2010 to 2014, Mr. Siu worked as an Associate Director in the Investment Banking Division at Daiwa Capital Markets Hong Kong Limited. In 2015, Mr. Siu joined UBS AG as a director where he originated and executed public and private fundraising transactions. In 2016, Mr. Siu founded and worked as the chief executive officer of Impressed Technology Limited, which operates an on-demand, door-to-door pickup and delivery dry cleaning and laundry online platform in Hong Kong. Since 2021, Mr. Siu has re-joined GCA Professional Service Group as the chief executive officer. Mr. Siu graduated from the University of Toronto in commerce in 2005 and is a CFA and a member of AICPA.

Ms. Ka Lee Lam 

Independent Director

=Committees=

Ms. Ka Lee Lam, has over 10 years of experience in business management, investment banking and operation control. From 2016 to 2019, Ms. Lam served as an executive director of Huisheng International Holdings Limited (a company listed on the Stock Exchange with stock code:01340). From 2009 to 2011, Ms. Lam worked in the operations department at Bank of America Merrill Lynch. From 2011 to 2012, Ms. Lam worked as an analyst at Barclays Capital Asia Ltd. From 2012 to 2016, Ms. Lam worked in the operations department at ABN AMRO Clearing Hong Kong Limited. Ms. Lam obtained a Bachelor of Business (Accounting) degree from Swinburne University of Technology in Australia in 2008.
